00052 #define  GET_FIELD_PTR(structPtr, typeName, fieldName) \
00053   ((uint8_t *)(structPtr) + offsetof(typeName, fieldName))
00054 
00055 #define GET_PARENT_BY_FIELD(TYPE, FIELD, FIELD_POINTER)  \
00056   ((TYPE *)(((uint8_t *)FIELD_POINTER) - offsetof(TYPE, FIELD)))
00057 #define GET_CONST_PARENT_BY_FIELD(TYPE, FIELD, FIELD_POINTER)  \
00058   ((const TYPE *)(((const uint8_t *)FIELD_POINTER) - offsetof(TYPE, FIELD)))
00059 
00060 #define GET_STRUCT_BY_FIELD_POINTER(struct_type, field_name, field_pointer)\
00061   ((struct_type *) (((uint8_t *) field_pointer) - FIELD_OFFSET(struct_type, field_name)))
00062 #define GET_INDEX_FROM_OFFSET(PTR1, PTR2)  (PTR1 - PTR2)
00063 
00064 // Size of slice between firstField end lastField of struct (including lastField)
00065 #define SLICE_SIZE(type, firstField, lastField)\
00066   (offsetof(type, lastField) - offsetof(type, firstField) + sizeof(((type *)0)->lastField))
00067 
00068 #define ARRAY_SIZE(a) (sizeof(a)/sizeof(a[0]))

00070 #define ADD_COMMA(value, n) value,
00071 /* Macro for array initialization */

00075 #define FIELD_OFFSET(struct_type, field_name)\

00078 #define MIN(x,y) ((x)<(y)?(x):(y))
00079 #define MAX(x,y) ((x)<(y)?(y):(x))
00080 
00081 #define FIRST_BIT_SET(bitmask)     ((bitmask) & (~(bitmask) + 1))
00082 #define FIRST_BIT_CLEARED(bitmask) (~(bitmask) & ((bitmask) + 1))
00083 
00084 #define COMPARE_WITH_THRESHOLD(a, b, threshold) \
00085   (abs((a) - (b)) < (threshold) ? ((a) > (b) ? 1 : 0) : ((a) > (b) ? 0 : 1))
00086 
00087 #define CEIL(a, b) (((a) - 1U)/(b) + 1U)

00091 /**************************************************************************/
00099 INLINE void *SYS_ByteMemcpy(void *dst, const void *src, uint16_t size)
00100 {
00101   uint8_t *dst_ = (uint8_t *) dst;
00102   const uint8_t *src_ = (const uint8_t *) src;
00103 
00104   while(size--)
00105     *(dst_++) = *(src_++);
00106   return dst;
00107 }

00179 /**************************************************************************/
00189 INLINE uint16_t SYS_Crc16Ccitt(uint16_t initValue, uint8_t byte)
00190 {
00191   byte ^= initValue & 0xffU;
00192   byte ^= byte << 4U;
00193 
00194   return ((((uint16_t)byte << 8) | ((initValue & 0xff00U) >> 8))
00195           ^ (uint8_t)(byte >> 4) ^ ((uint16_t)byte << 3));
00196 }
